snippet: Designed to clean every household surface and texture, the Dyson DC44 Digital Slim cordless vacuum cleaner is a stocky little machine with interchangeable attachments — a Mr. Potato Head for neatniks.
abstract: Dyson introduces the DC44 Digital Slim cordless vacuum cleaner, which features more battery life than predecessor DC35.
lead_paragraph: Designed to clean every household surface and texture, the Dyson DC44 Digital Slim cordless vacuum cleaner is a stocky little machine with interchangeable attachments — a Mr. Potato Head for neatniks.

headline.seo: Dyson Digital Slim Vacuum Cleaner: the Sequel
headline.main: Like a Sprinter, Bursts of Power
headline.print_headline: Like a Sprinter, Bursts of Power
